name: Super Alan Saga Beta Demo
description:
You play with Super Alan, a walrusthat can throw air punches that destroy some type of enemys, but other enemys you have to smash their heads.

It´s a platform game in development, and we don´t know if it´s going to continue (a little donation would help, but you don´t have to donate, only if you want to help and say that you want more of Super Alan Saga)

if you have problems with playing wait a few minutes, if it doesn't work, try restarting the page, if even this doesn't work please contact us

If you have any problem please contact us as fast as you can on squidgames223@gmail.com or victorfuruta@gmail.com, but we are unfortunately not sure if we will respond as quickly as possible ;-;

(This is Victor first game and  he made it by himself, only the Alan original design that has been made by other Squid Games Members, so we sorry if you´re having troubles and findings bugs, but if you are, please tell us!)
